org.drip.math.solver1D

Class BracketingOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.math.solver1D.ExecutionInitializationOutput
      • org.drip.math.solver1D.BracketingOutput

  • public class BracketingOutput
extends ExecutionInitializationOutput
    BracketingOutput carries the results of the bracketing initialization. In addition to the fields of ExecutionInitializationOutput, BracketingOutput holds the left/right bracket variates and the corresponding values for the objective function.

    • Constructor Summary

      BracketingOutput()
      Default BracketingOutput constructor: Initializes the output
